name: A message
description:
This game has been developed by Team Neko in the course of the  Game'n'Train Mixer 2021 hosted by the Goethe Institute New Delhi, in cooperation with the Stiftung Digitale Spiele Kultur and Games Bavaria. The game was developed under the topic of digital literacy and should spread awareness about internet savety.

Game Description:

'A message' is a choice based, story driven point and click adventure, which has replay ability. The choices made in the game have impact on the outcome and progress of the game.

The game features the story of a young cat who is facing trouble at home and tries to find an outlet of her emotions with daily evening walks in the city. On their journey, they get in touch with a stranger online, who seems to understand their situation and offers their help.
